10_1MEWJRMLgvofqG9Mbsb2Rc4hFFyv7HeRx7.body: There is technically NO SUCH THING as Deep Web. It is a fictitious term started by either Main Stream Media or US Government to give anonymity and decentralization a dark and evil public perception when it is NOT.   TOR Project does not use the term "deep web" to describe anything because what they do saves lives, and defends freedom.

Decentralized and No Censorship means DECENTRALIZED, NO CENSORSHIP.
